ack.p: The authors thank Margaret Clifford, Cory Penca, Jason Stanley, Paul Skelly, Paul Hornby, and Trevor Smith for their continuous support and insights for this project. We thank workshop participants and Cuban collaborators for their contributions and inputs. We also thank Marlene Veitia Rubio from INISAV and René López-Castilla from INAF for helping gain approval to provide share relevant scientific literature and information. This research was conducted under the collaboration agreement between the University of Florida and Instituto de Investigaciones de Sanidad Vegetal. Opinions presented in this publication are not necessarily those of USDA APHIS.
